resources: • ONLINECrúbadán language data for Mescalero-Chiricahua Apache. Kevin Scannell. 2015. The Crúbadán Project. oai:crubadan.org:apm
• ONLINEChiricahua Apache. Hoijer, Harry. 1946. Linguistic Structures of Native America. oai:refdb.wals.info:4642
• ONLINEMescalero Apache Dictionary. Breuninger, Evelyn; Hugar, Elbys; Lathan, Ellen Ann. 1982. Mescalero Apache Tribe. oai:refdb.wals.info:5270
• ONLINEReadings in American Indian linguistics. Haas, Mary R. (researcher). [[undated]]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:Haas.063
• ONLINEApache, Mescalero-Chiricahua: a language of United States. n.a. 2013. SIL International. oai:ethnologue.com:apm

• ONLINELINGUIST List Resources for Apache, Mescalero-Chiricahua. Damir Cavar, Director of Linguist List (editor); Malgorzata E. Cavar, Director of Linguist List (editor). 2015-11-06. The LINGUIST List (www.linguistlist.org). oai:linguistlist.org:lang_apm
• ONLINEGlottolog 2.6 Resources for Mescalero-Chiricahua Apache. n.a. 2015. Max Planck Institute for the Science of Human History. oai:glottolog.org:mesc1238
• ONLINEPHOIBLE Online phonemic inventories for Mescalero-Chiricahua Apache. n.a. 2014. Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology. oai:phoible.org:apm
• ONLINEWALS Online Resources for Apache (Chiricahua). n.a. 2008. Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology. oai:wals.info:apc
• Plains and Southwest Area Indian songs. Beartrap, Harvey (consultant); Pesho, Harvey (consultant); Quinn, Frank (researcher). [1956 July]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:24-114

• Elicitation of various words and phrases. Includes numbers, terms for people, and body parts.. Nicholas, Dan (consultant); Tyler, Guy (researcher); Naiche, Barney (consultant). [1963-05]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 218.001

• Elicitation of miscellaneous words and phrases such as wood and spoon. Tyler, Guy (researcher); Nicholas, Dan (consultant); Naiche, Barney (consultant). [1963-05]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 218.002
• Elicitation of basic vocabulary. Includes several kinship and weather terms.. Tyler, Guy (researcher). [1960-09]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 218.003
• Elicitation of conversational phrases like "give me a smoke". Tyler, Guy (researcher). [1960-09]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 218.004
• Chiricahua and Mescalero Apache texts. Hoijer, Harry, 1904-. 1938. University of Chicago publications in anthropology. Linguistic series. oai:gial.edu:1420
